column4: is it possible to have a folder be a file template? So you can choose Create New -> "SomeProject" in Nautilus/Thunar?
try making a folder in the Template directory? I recall there being such a dir.
I tried, but then it just uses the folder as a submenu in the "Create" menu
i never use the feature - i even remove all templates.. i never use them. so  guess it cant then.
